caption.p: Principal component analysis (PCA) including potential osmotic ( Table 2), gas exchange ( Figure 3), biochemistry ( Figures 4, 5), oxidative stress ( Figure 6), and nutrients ( Figure S2) in Calotropis procera under semiarid and seacoast environment in rainy and drought seasons of 2012 and 2013. Vectors with values above 0.70 of correlation were represented.
